name: Pilgrim's Hallow
description:
Play as Vrik, the draconian warrior, as you investigate the mysterious disappearance of the village of Pilgrim hollow.

In this 2.5D adventure inspired by classics, like Paper Mario and The Legend Of Zelda, you will go against dark forces as you explore a mysterious temple in a cute pixel-art style.
Take your time ... or fight the clock with the challenging speed-run mode!

Beware of the terror that lay in the depth.

-------

This game was made as a demonstration of my abilities as a developer.
If you liked what you played and are looking for a C# programmer you can find me on twitter @BoucleV
